item.title: Elasticsearch安装和简单介绍
item.description: Elasticsearch安装和简单介绍 一、ES和kibana安装 elasticsearch-5.3.1 curl -L -O https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-5.3.1.zip unzip elasticsearch-5.3.1.zip mv elasticsearch-5.3.1 elasticsearch OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM warning: INFO: os::commit_memory(0x000000008a660000, 1973026816, 0) failed; error=‘Cannot allocate memory’ (errno=12) vim config/jvm.options # 修改-Xms1g -Xmx1g 配
